text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires stating that processing sensitive personal data is possible if it falls under one of the exceptions of Art. 9 of the GDPR. The candidate answer explicitly identifies the collected data (ability to practice sports) as potentially 'sensitive data (special categories under Article 9 RGPD)' and later mentions that the legal basis for processing this data, especially if it relates to health, requires 'Explicit consent or another strict basis (e.g., public interest for medical prevention)' which directly addresses the conditions under which sensitive data processing is permitted under Article 9 exceptions.", "criterion_id": "da699e98-14ef-4832-ab6f-e586bce8ec3c"}
